title: Thai Chicken Skewers with Peanut Sauce
ingredients: ['For the chicken skewers', '2 tablespoons vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 teaspoons tamarind paste', '1 stalk lemon grass, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 tablespoon lime juice', '1 teaspoon dark muscovado sugar', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '900g skinless, chicken breast fillets, cut into strips', '20 wooden skewers, soaked in water for 30 minutes', 'For the peanut sauce', '2 tablespoons crunchy peanut butter', '2 tablespoons chopped peanuts', '1 (400ml) can coconut milk', '2 teaspoons red Thai curry paste', '1 tablespoon fish sauce', '1 teaspoon tomato puree', '1 tablespoon dark brown soft sugar']
